00028         if (!m_image.Initialize(doc))
00029                 return false;
00030         return true;
00031 }
00032 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------

00035         color.Clear();

00042 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 void SkinDialog::DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX)
00044 {
00045         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_SKINIMAGE, m_image);
00046         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_HISTOGRAMIMAGE, m_histogram);
00047         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_COLORIMAGE, m_color);
00048         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_SKIN_SCROLLBAR1, m_vbar);
00049         DDX_Control(pDX, IDC_SKIN_SCROLLBAR2, m_hbar);
00050         DDX_Radio(pDX, IDC_SKIN_2DHISTORGAM, m_skinType);
00051 }
00052 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 void SkinDialog::OnVScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00054 {
00055         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00056         int minpos;
00057         int maxpos;
00058         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00059         SCROLLINFO   info;
00060     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00061         switch (nSBCode)
00062     {
00063                 case SB_TOP:      
00064                         curpos = minpos;
00065                         break;
00066                 case SB_BOTTOM:     
00067                         curpos = maxpos;
00068                         break;
00069                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00070                         break;
00071                 case SB_LINEUP:      
00072                         if (curpos > minpos)
00073                                 curpos--;
00074                         break;
00075                 case SB_LINEDOWN:   
00076                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00077                                 curpos++;
00078                         break;
00079                 case SB_PAGEUP:    
00080                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00081                         break;
00082                 case SB_PAGEDOWN:
00083                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00084                         break;
00085                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00086                         curpos = nPos;     
00087                         break;
00088                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00089                         curpos = nPos;     
00090                         break;
00091     }    
00092         offsety = curpos;
00093         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00094         m_image.Invalidate();
00095         CDialog::OnVScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00096 }
00097 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 void SkinDialog::OnHScroll(UINT nSBCode, UINT nPos, CScrollBar* pScrollBar) 
00099 {
00100         int curpos = pScrollBar->GetScrollPos();
00101         int minpos;
00102         int maxpos;
00103         pScrollBar->GetScrollRange(&minpos, &maxpos);
00104         SCROLLINFO   info;
00105     pScrollBar->GetScrollInfo(&info, SIF_ALL);
00106         switch (nSBCode)
00107     {
00108                 case SB_LEFT:      
00109                         curpos = minpos;
00110                         break;
00111                 case SB_RIGHT:     
00112                         curpos = maxpos;
00113                         break;
00114                 case SB_ENDSCROLL: 
00115                         break;
00116                 case SB_LINELEFT:      
00117                         if (curpos > minpos)
00118                                 curpos--;
00119                         break;
00120                 case SB_LINERIGHT:   
00121                         if (curpos < maxpos)
00122                                 curpos++;
00123                         break;
00124                 case SB_PAGELEFT:    
00125                         curpos = max(minpos, curpos - (int) info.nPage);
00126                         break;
00127                 case SB_PAGERIGHT:
00128                         curpos = min(maxpos, curpos + (int) info.nPage);
00129                         break;
00130                 case SB_THUMBPOSITION: 
00131                         curpos = nPos;     
00132                         break;
00133                 case SB_THUMBTRACK:
00134                         curpos = nPos;     
00135                         break;
00136     }    
00137         offsetx = curpos; 
00138         pScrollBar->SetScrollPos(curpos);
00139         m_image.Invalidate();
00140         CDialog::OnHScroll(nSBCode, nPos, pScrollBar);
00141 }

00157  CSkinControl::CSkinControl() {
00158 }
00159 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00160 bool CSkinControl::Initialize(CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00161         // Get first frame from file or camera
00162         image.CopyOf(imgFrame);
00163         // Show scroll bars
00164         if (m_hWnd) {
00165                 SkinDialog* tab = (SkinDialog*)GetParent();
00166                 CRect r; this->GetWindowRect(&r);
00167                 SCROLLINFO horz;
00168                 horz.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00169                 horz.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00170                 horz.nPage = 50;
00171                 horz.nMin = 0;
00172                 horz.nMax = image.Width()-r.Width()+horz.nPage;
00173                 horz.nPos = 0;
00174                 horz.nTrackPos = 0;
00175                 tab->m_hbar.SetScrollInfo(&horz);
00176                 SCROLLINFO vert;
00177                 vert.cbSize = sizeof(SCROLLINFO);
00178                 vert.fMask = SIF_ALL;
00179                 vert.nPage = 50;
00180                 vert.nMin = 0;
00181                 vert.nMax = image.Height()-r.Height()+vert.nPage;
00182                 vert.nPos = 0;
00183                 vert.nTrackPos = 0;
00184                 tab->m_vbar.SetScrollInfo(&vert);
00185                 tab->m_vbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Vertical Scroll Bar
00186                 tab->m_hbar.ShowWindow(true);  //Hide Horizontal Scroll Bar
00187                 tab->offsetx = 0; tab->offsety = 0;
00188                 this->Invalidate();
00189         }
00190         return true;
00191 }
00192 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 void CSkinControl::OnLButtonDown(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00194 {
00195         CWnd::OnLButtonDown(nFlags, point);
00196         SkinDialog* tab = ((SkinDialog*)this->GetParent());
00197         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00198         Pixel p;
00199         Image::getPixel(image.GetImage(), &p, point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y);
00200         tab->AddValue(cvScalar(p.B, p.G, p.R));
00201         tab->Invalidate();
00202         tab->UpdateWindow();
00203 }
00204 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00205 void CSkinControl::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point)
00206 {
00207         CWnd::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00208         SkinDialog* tab = ((SkinDialog*)this->GetParent());
00209         CPoint off = CPoint(tab->m_hbar.GetScrollPos(), tab->m_vbar.GetScrollPos());
00210         Pixel p;
00211         Image::getPixel(image.GetImage(), &p, point.x+off.x, point.y+off.y);
00212         tab->m_color.color = RGB(p.R, p.G, p.B);
00213         tab->m_color.Invalidate();
00214         tab->m_color.UpdateWindow();
00215 }
00216 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 void CSkinControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00218         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00219         SkinDialog* dlg=((SkinDialog*)this->GetParent());
00220         image.Show(pDC->m_hDC, 0, 0, image.Width(), image.Height(), dlg->offsetx, dlg->offsety);
00221 }

00234 // ------------------ CColorControl class -----------------------------------
00235 CColorControl::CColorControl() {
00236         color = RGB(0, 0, 0);
00237 };
00238 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 void CColorControl::DrawItem(LPDRAWITEMSTRUCT lpDrawItemStruct) {
00240         CDC* pDC = CDC::FromHandle(lpDrawItemStruct->hDC);
00241         CRect box;      pDC->GetWindow()->GetWindowRect(&box);
00242         CBrush fill;   
00243         fill.CreateSolidBrush(color);   
00244         CRect rect(0, 0, box.Width(), box.Height());
00245         pDC->FillRect(&rect, &fill);
00246 }
